channel.title: introduction on Not A Rocket Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in introduction on Not A Rocket Scientist

item.title: Need To Write More
item.description: Ever since I discovered Hugo, GitHub Page and LandChad, I always wanted to set up my own web page and write stuff about things I want to understand. This is an important practice for self education. In general, I sort of managed to do it. The current site is hosted on a LightSail server following the instructions from LandChad, and the content is written in Markdown and built by Hugo.

item.title: Hello, Hugo!
item.description: Well, the idea of using Markdown to write blog posts is hard to resist, and Hugo + Github Pages are awesome! The theme of this site is called Gokarna by Avijit Gupta.
